featured.text: Which of the following statements is true about Toni Morrison? (A)
Why did Morrison join the writers’ group?
According to the passage, what is one of the themes in Morrison’s works? (A)
In Song of Solomon, for example, Morrison tells the story of an African American man and his search for identity in his culture.
In 1993, Morrison received the Nobel Prize in Literature.

other.text: After graduating from college, Morrison started to work as a teacher and got married in 1958.
In 1964, Morrison got divorced and devoted herself to writing.
In her novels, Morrison brings in different elements of the African American past, their struggles, problems and cultural memory.
From 1970 to 1992, Morrison published five more novels.

definition.zh_def: 莫里森（Morrison）是一個常見的姓氏，可能指代多位著名人物或品牌。
definition.en_def: Morrison is a common surname that may refer to various notable individuals or brands.
definition.example: Morrison is known for his contributions to literature.
